0.4.7.name: wordpress/simplereach-slide
0.4.7.description:
The Slide by SimpleReach is the best way to help readers discover more of your content.

The Slide recommends related posts from within your site on a widget that "slides" in at the bottom of the page. You've seen a similar content recommendation widget on sites like NYTimes.com, and now SimpleReach is allowing anybody to take advantage of this awesome plugin for free.

NOTE: After installation, you must go to Settings -> SimpleReach Slide in your plugins list to turn on The Slide

If you have any questions, please contact us at support@simplereach.com.

Benefits

  • Increased pageviews and time on site
  • Increased sharing on Twitter and Facebook via social buttons
  • Recommends posts most likely to be shared on social networks
  • Allow readers to opt-out

The Slide uses ‘asynchronous loading’ and will not affect the load time of your pages.
